summary:
The gallbladder is a small organ that stores and concentrates bile, a liquid made by the liver. It is located under the liver in humans. Bile helps digest fats in the small intestine.

Sometimes, the gallbladder can have problems like gallstones, which are hard chunks of material that can cause pain. These might need the gallbladder to be removed. Inflammation of the gallbladder, called cholecystitis, can also occur due to various reasons.
title: Gallbladder
